name: Famimily
description:
In this 2D puzzle game / platformer, you play a little girl in search of her roots, and therefore her lost family. During the different levels, you will play in this configuration, one player, two players, then three players, all simultaneously. The little girl has a strong bond with her family, so strong that she will bond with them.

Game created during the Global Game Jam ( 30 January - 5 February 2023) 

  • PS : We made the game in 2 days, not 7.

TEAM :

  • Ruche Mehdi : Game Designer / Level Designer
  • Mathieu Botela : Game Designer / Level Designer / Game Dev /  https://matelpitou.itch.io/
